alert.note: Alert for Four Corners, Upper Dolores River (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 28 at 1:38AM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow amounts possible above 5500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible with locally higher amounts possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Four Corners/Upper Dolores River. In Utah, Southeast Utah and Canyonlands/Natural Bridges. * WHEN...Tuesday evening through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
